FuncDef:
The display bgp multicast routing-table command displays the MBGP routing information of a specified network in the MBGP routing table.
The display bgp multicast routing-table statistics command displays the number of routes in the MBGP routing table.
The display bgp multicast routing-table community-filter command displays the multicast routing information that matches a specified MBGP community filter in the MBGP routing table.
The display bgp multicast routing-table community command displays the routes that carry the specified MBGP community attribute in the routing table.
The display bgp multicast routing-table large-community command displays information about the MBGP routes with a specified Large-Community value.
The display bgp multicast routing-table large-community-filter command displays information about the multicast routes that match a specified MBGP Large-Community list.
CLIs: display bgp multicast routing-table statistics [ active ]
display bgp multicast routing-table community [ <communityNum> | <strCommunityNum> | internet | no-advertise | no-export | no-export-subconfed ] &<1-33>
display bgp multicast routing-table community [ <communityNum> | <strCommunityNum> | internet | no-advertise | no-export | no-export-subconfed ] &<1-33> whole-match
display bgp multicast routing-table community-filter <community-filter-num> whole-match
display bgp multicast routing-table community-filter <community-filter-name> whole-match
display bgp multicast routing-table extcommunity [ rt <strExtCommunity> ] &<1-33>
display bgp multicast routing-table extcommunity [ rt <strExtCommunity> ] &<1-33> match-any
display bgp multicast routing-table large-community [ <strLargeCommunityNum> ] &<1-33> whole-match
display bgp multicast routing-table large-community-filter <large-community-filter-name> whole-match

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of active routes.
-

Specifies an IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the mask length of the IPv4 address.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 32.

Specifies the mask of the IPv4 address.
-

Specifies the name of a community filter.
-

Specifies the number of a basic community filter.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 99.

Specifies the number of an advanced community filter.
The value is an integer ranging from 100 to 199.

Specify community number.
-

Specifies the communities value.
-

Displays MBGP routes with the Internet community attribute. The Internet community attribute indicates that the route can be sent to any other peer.
-

Displays MBGP routes with the No-Advertise community attribute. The No-Advertise community attribute indicates that the route will not be sent to any other peer.
-

Displays MBGP routes with the No-Export community attribute. The No-Export community attribute indicates that the route will be advertised to other sub-ASs in the confederation, not outside the confederation.
-

Displays MBGP routes with the No-Export-Subconfed community attribute. The No-Export-Subconfed community attribute indicates that the route will not be advertised outside the local AS.
-

Indicates exact match.
-

Matches routes whose masks are shorter than the specified mask length.
-

Specifies the extended community list of the route which will be displayed.
-

Specify a route target extended community.
-

Indicates that matches anyone with specified extend communities.
-

Specifies the name of a extcommunity-filter.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 characters.

Specifies the extcommunity filter number (basic).
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 199.

Specifies the extcommunity filter number (advanced).
The value is an integer ranging from 200 to 399.

Specifies the Large-community list of the route which will be displayed.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 characters.

Specifies a value of the Large-Community attribute.
-

Specifies the large community filter name.
-

Displays statistics of route.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp multicast routing-table large-community-filter a
BGP Local router ID is 12.12.12.9
Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
h - history,  i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin : i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
RPKI validation codes: V - valid, I - invalid, N - not-found
Network            NextHop        MED        LocPrf    PrefVal Path/Ogn
<HUAWEI> display bgp multicast routing-table large-community 200:1:1
BGP Local router ID is 1.1.1.2
Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
h - history,  i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin : i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
RPKI validation codes: V - valid, I - invalid, N - not-found
Total Number of Routes: 4
Network        NextHop    MED    LocPrf    PrefVal   large-community
<HUAWEI> display bgp multicast routing-table community 100:100
Total Number of Routes: 1
BGP local router ID is 10.10.10.9
Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
h - history,  i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin : i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
RPKI validation codes: V - valid, I - invalid, N - not-found
Network          NextHop      MED    LocPrf    PrefVal    Community
<HUAWEI> display bgp multicast routing-table community 100:100 internet
BGP local router ID is 10.10.10.9
Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
h - history,  i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin : i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
RPKI validation codes: V - valid, I - invalid, N - not-found
Total Number of Routes: 5
Network         NextHop      MED      LocPrf    PrefVal   Community
<HUAWEI> display bgp multicast routing-table community-filter 1
BGP local router ID is 10.10.10.9
Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
h - history,  i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin : i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
RPKI validation codes: V - valid, I - invalid, N - not-found
Network            NextHop        MED        LocPrf    PrefVal    Community
<HUAWEI> display bgp multicast routing-table statistics
Total Number of Routes: 50
<HUAWEI> display bgp multicast routing-table statistics active
Total Number of Prefix Advertised to RM : 2
Total Number of Active Route : 2
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If ipv4-address is not specified, this command will display all the information in the MBGP routing table.
